name: Sarah Johnson
bio: Professional jazz and pop vocalist with 10+ years of experience performing at weddings, corporate events, and private parties.

name: DJ Mike Rodriguez
bio: High-energy DJ specializing in weddings, corporate events, and nightclub performances. Expert in multiple genres including EDM, Hip-Hop, and Latin music.

name: Elena Petrov
bio: Professional ballet and contemporary dancer with performances at Lincoln Center and international venues.

name: Dr. James Wilson
bio: Motivational speaker and business consultant with expertise in leadership development and team building.

name: Maria Santos
bio: Latin music specialist performing traditional and contemporary songs for cultural events and celebrations.

name: DJ Alex Chen
bio: Electronic music producer and DJ with a focus on house, techno, and ambient soundscapes for upscale events.

name: The Phoenix Dance Crew
bio: Award-winning hip-hop and street dance crew available for competitions, showcases, and entertainment events.

name: Lisa Thompson
bio: Tech industry executive and keynote speaker focusing on innovation, digital transformation, and women in technology.
